cause.description:
Motor Neurone Disease (MND) is a progressive neurodegenerative disease that attacks the upper and lower motor neurones.
Degeneration of the motor neurones leads to weakness and wasting of muscles, causing increasing loss of mobility in the limbs, and difficulties with speech, swallowing and breathing.
In America MND is known as ALS or Lou Gehrig's Disease
Please see www.mnda.org for further information, or feel free to message me.
~Katy
1. Support all research to find a cure for Motor Neurone Disease
2. Enable those who live with MND to live as normal a life as possible for the longest time
